name: Dice Dinos [Jam Edition]
description:
[Friends may be required for use of this product. Please don't rate this game for the game jam unless you play it with somebody else :D

It's REALLY fun in multiplayer. Just saying, because it is actually true. REALLY fun.]

The goal of the game is to be the last dino left alive, by using explosive dice to blow up everybody else. Some say that's how the dinosaurs actually went extinct.

Controls:
  • Blue: Arrow Keys + Space
  • Red: WASD + E
  • Yellow: TFGH + Y
  • Green: IJKL + O
Dice Bombs

Use Space, E, Y or O to drop a dice bomb at your feet. After a few seconds, it will explode, sending fire in all directions. Please do not try this at home.

Bombs can destroy bushes, but not rocks. Make sure you're never in a bomb's way or things could go horribly wrong for you. (And wonderfully right for everybody against you.)

Power Ups

Sometimes a power up is hidden in a bush that you just happen to blow up.

  • Dice with plus symbols on them give you one extra bomb. This means you can place multiple explosives at once! (Again, please don't try this at home, and especially not with real dinosaurs.)
  • Dice with up arrows on them upgrade your bomb power. By collecting this, your bomb explosions will travel further distances (up to a maximum of 6).

Now go play, because that's it.

Credits
  • Music: Kevin MacLeod ("Happy Alley" and "Who Likes to Party")
  • Sound Effects: Made on sfxr.me
  • Artwork: Spruce Studios, arks.itch.io and allenski.itch.io
  • Scripting: Spruce Studios
